overview: Elijah Chambersâ€™ newest film, Citrus Rush follows a group of four friends; Ryan, Kylie, Devon, and Sam. Their lives are pretty normal until Devon catches a deadly virus that eats away at vital tissue. There is no known cure for such a disease, but the crew is eager to find a way. Can Devon make it out alive, or are these kids biting off more than they can chew?
tagline: Can Devon make it out alive, or are these kids biting off more than they can chew?
title: Citrus Rush
